titleStmt.title: The vanitie of man, in his best estate a sermon preached at St. Maries in Nottingham, March 18. 1657. at the funeral of the honourable Francis Pierepont, Esq; third son to the right honourable Robert late Earl of Kingston. By William Reynolds, M.A. minister of the Gospel at St. Maries in Nottingham.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, William, 1625-1698.
Whitlock, John, 1625-1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Rothwel, at the Fountain in Goldsmiths-row in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: John Whitlock. William Reynolds.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Fountain in Goldsmiths-row in Cheapside
